tool_description: Aggregates weather forecasts from multiple geographic locations to create regional summaries and identify spatial weather patterns.

location_coordinates.description: Array of location coordinate pairs as strings (lat,lon)

forecast_data.description: Forecast values for all locations (flattened array)

aggregation_method.description: Method for combining forecasts: mean, median, weighted_average

weight_factors.description: Weight factors for each location (for weighted_average)

regional_name.description: Name for the regional forecast area

include_spatial_analysis.description: Include spatial gradient and pattern analysis

error_messages: Array length mismatch: location_coordinates and location_names must have the same length.
Forecast data insufficient: forecast_data length must match number of locations Ã— time periods.
Invalid aggregation method: Use one of [mean, median, weighted_average].
Weight factors mismatch: If using weighted_average, weight_factors must have same length as locations.
Invalid coordinates format: Use 'latitude,longitude' format for coordinates.
Time period mismatch: Number of time_periods must match forecast data structure.
usage: Provide arrays of location coordinates, names, and corresponding forecast data. Specify regional_name and time_periods. Optionally choose aggregation_method and enable spatial analysis. Returns regional forecast summary.

regional_forecast.description: Aggregated forecast values for the region

forecast_range.description: Min and max values across all locations
